text: Anatoly Alekseevich Chukanov (; 10 May 1954 – 12 June 2021)Ушел из жизни Анатолий Чуканов was a Soviet and Russian cyclist. He was part of the Soviet team that won the 100 km team time trial at the 1976 Summer Olympics and 1977 UCI Road World Championships. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Russian cyclists
title: Anatoly Chukanov
